body_html: Install CUDNN6.0. Older version used 5.0. Both 5.0 and 6.0 can co exists. Just download and copy the files to /usr/local/cuda/include and /usr/local/cuda/lib64 the corresponding file. I had this issue upgrading tensorflow to 1.3.
